website_summaries.verdict: Adorable patterns that both little and big kids are bound to love. They run small, so make sure you order a size up.
pros: Pull-on elastic waistband is easy for kids to use
cons: May run small - consider ordering a size up

customer_reviews.title: Cute pattern but runs small and wears out quick
customer_reviews.text: These run small and knees wore out quickly. My 5 yr old has long legs and slim body and usually 5s fit her but these were short and tighter than usual from the first. Knees wore out on both pairs (saggy faded and thinning fabric) within a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I had looked for the butterfly leggings for a Christmas present, and couldn't find them in the size I needed, anywhere. I was so excited when I saw them on your website, through an email that you sent me. I ordered them and had them sent to my granddaughter. They fit perfectly. She loved them, as well as the extra pair that she got with them. It was definitely a win/win for me. And my granddaughter was very happy, which was the most important part of this.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Buys

customer_reviews.title: Fading after a few wears
customer_reviews.text: After wearing it and washing it 3 times they have already faded in color.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Look good but too short
customer_reviews.text: Look great just too short. I've never bought Carter so didnt know how they run. I'm daughter is in the 8th percentile in height she is very tiny. And she is 6 years old. So I assume size 6/6× would fit her. Bummed.. now we know we have to size up with carters.
customer_reviews.author: @amysmilez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Very good everyday leggings. EDIT: Carter leggings always keep the bar high. Very impressive. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, far superior to Oshkosh.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed some new leggings, so I turned to amazon. These Carters leggings still looked brand new after one wear unlike the Oshkosh ones which were destroyed after the same type of wear. They fit the same, but Carters material held up so much better!
customer_reviews.author: SaltySailor

customer_reviews.title: Not like reqular Carter brand leggings
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that these do not seem like the regular Carter leggings. These are very thin, material feels almost scratchy, which was weird and even washing hasnt helped the feel of them. The fit was perfect but the material is just not normal.
customer_reviews.author: kathy r. peters

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 18 months toddler,size 3 but they are small my daughter is tall,I recommend a bigger size,otherwise they are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ntfitness_may

customer_reviews.title: Very tight and form fitting leggings
customer_reviews.text: These are true leggings, very tight and form fitting. The flower print is a weird almost plastic like fabric. I got the 3T for my tall 2 year old, and I wish I would have gotten 4T. They aren't bad, but not fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to the durability of these but the material is good and they look very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Luly

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Durable, washes well, but runs small. Size up one size.
customer_reviews.author: Jahosh

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 4 years old (4T). I like the material; soft and stretching. It fit perfectly on her. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: shrinkage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8 for my older grandchild. She was thrilled. With one wash they shrank to fit the younger girl, a size six. Needless to say the intended recipient was not pleased. The tights were fine but even washed in cold water the shrinkage was extreme. Otherwise they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: I was not fond of the light colored ballerina print.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good for a petite girl
customer_reviews.text: Fits well for my petite daughter. Washes well too. Fun patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size
customer_reviews.text: Way to small I got a size 4t I would go up away size but they really cutee 😍😍🥰
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Slim fit
customer_reviews.text: Not ideal for potty training, because they are cut very slim. Otherwise, they are very cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Bruner

customer_reviews.title: No tag, are these new??
customer_reviews.text: These pants arrived without tags. How do I tell if they are NEW or not.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy fabric
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the flower pants but the heart pants are really scratchy on the inside because of how they are printed. I am sending them back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bright and bold colours It's what I expected Thanks so much....
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Mingo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy and true to size. The fabrics are thick. My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy wear
customer_reviews.text: Just as thought! Perfect for a 3 yr olds birthday! She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Potter

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft cotton and they are easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to think they are comfy and loves the patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Get a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Love the material however they didn't fit exactly as expected they were a tad bit too small
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Johnston

product_meta.title: Carter's Girls' 2-Pack Leggings
product_meta.description: Keep her feeling comfortable and stylish with these mix-and-match stretchy leggings in varying fun colors
